pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate longitudinal changes in urinary function and quality of life, and the oncological outcomes of patients treated with urethra-sparing high-intensity focused ultrasound for localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Which technology to select for primary focal treatment of prostate cancer?-European Section of Urotechnology (ESUT) position statement
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29743538/
